mapper.select: select EXISTS(SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE p_id=#{p_id} and u_id=#{u_id}) as exist;

SELECT p_id, start_address, start_name, end_address, end_name, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as start_date, done FROM POST WHERE p_id in (SELECT p_id FROM MEMBER WHERE u_id=#{u_id}) ORDER BY created_at desc;
SELECT U.u_id, name, seat_number FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN USER U on U.u_id = M.u_id WHERE p_id = #{p_id}
SELECT done FROM POST WHERE p_id = #{p_id}
